feed.title: Soirée, a night of fabulous music

entry.title: Soirée Tickets Now Available
entry.summary: This is most exciting! Tickets for Soirée, a night of fabulous music, are now available! Tell your friends and family, get them along, and also share on your social media. Entry is $25 with a bar and light refreshments available. Doors open at 6pm, and…
entry.content:
This is most exciting! Tickets for Soirée, a night of fabulous music, are now available! Tell your friends and family, get them along, and also share on your social media.

Entry is $25 with a bar and light refreshments available. Doors open at 6pm, and the performance starts at 7pm. Seating is allocated, so get in early to select your preferred seats.

You can also read more about the wonderful and talented artists that we have performing on the night.

  • Slade Gibson and Melissa Gill
  • Tessitura Acapella
  • The Vocalise Duo
  • Brisbane Folk Quartet
  • MINT
  • Duo Key

While you are waiting for the performances to begin, selected senior students from The Gap State School's instrumental music program will be playing in the foyer. During interval, the talented String Quartet from The Gap State High School will be performing for your listening pleasure.

This will be a COVID-safe event in compliance with Qld Health's guidelines. Check in with the Check In Qld app will be required before entry to the venue. If you do not have the app available to you, our volunteers will be able to assist you.

Grab those tickets for you, your family and your friends, and we'll see you at the Soirée!

entry.title: Official Launch
entry.summary: We are pleased to announce the full line-up for the Soirée on 11 September 2021. We have a great range of artists ready to delight with different styles of music. More information about the artists will be revealed in the coming weeks on this website…
entry.content:
We are pleased to announce the full line-up for the Soirée on 11 September 2021.

We have a great range of artists ready to delight with different styles of music.

  • Slade Gibson and Melissa Gill
  • Tessitura Acapella
  • MINT
  • Duo Key
  • Brisbane Folk Quartet
  • The Vocalise Duo

More information about the artists will be revealed in the coming weeks on this website and on our socials, so make sure to follow us on Facebook or Twitter to keep up to date with all of the latest news.

Tickets will go on sale on July 8. It will be allocated seating, so get in quick to choose your preferred seats. Along with requiring attendees to scan in using the Check In Qld app, this also helps to maintain compliance with current COVID restrictions defined by QLD Health. These measures will help us all to stay safe and be able to enjoy more of these live music events featuring local artists from our beautiful city.

We are looking forward to seeing you at the Soirée in September!

entry.title: Save the Date
entry.summary: We are very proud to announce a date for the next Soirée, a night of fabulous music showcasing musical talent for the local and surrounding areas. The next Soirée will be on Saturday 11 September 2021 at The Gap State School MPB, starting at 7pm.
entry.content:
We are very proud to announce a date for the next Soirée, a night of fabulous music showcasing musical talent for the local and surrounding areas.

The next Soirée will be on Saturday 11 September 2021 at The Gap State School MPB, starting at 7pm. We have six artists and groups lined up to perform a variety of musical styles and genres.

The Soirée in 2019 was a restart of the long-running Soirée series presented by the Music Supporters Group, and was the first major event in the new Multi-Purpose Building at The Gap State School. This year's event will build on the successful 2019 event with more performances from local artists and groups. While we also now have COVID restrictions to deal with as well, we are planning for this year's event to be even bigger and better.

More announcements will be appearing soon, along with how and where to purchase tickets. Keep an eye on this website or follow our Facebook and Twitter pages to be informed of new announcements as they happen.
